moves.name: X Sp. Atk
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Race You!
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Speed. Raises the user’s critical-hit rate.

moves.name: Scald
moves.effect: Removes the frozen condition from the user. Has a moderate chance of leaving the target burned.

passives.name: Lithe
passives.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting paralyzed.

passives.name: Power Reserves 2
passives.description: Powers up moves in a pinch.

passives.name: Superduper Effective 1
passives.description: Powers up moves that are super effective.
